definition: a challenge to do something dangerous or foolhardy, challenge
details:
noun
- a challenge to do something dangerous or foolhardy
= example: a challenge to do something dangerous or foolhardy
= synonyms: daring
verb
- challenge
= example: challenge
= synonyms: defy
- take upon oneself
= synonyms: presume, make bold
- to be courageous enough to try or do something
= example: to be courageous enough to try or do something
